about: I am Lakshmipriya RajeshKanna, a software engineer with a Master’s from Drexel University. I specialize in full-stack web development, DevOps, and AI-powered systems. I am experienced in Python, Java, JavaScript, React, Spring Boot, SQL, and cloud platforms like AWS.
skills: Python, Java, JavaScript, SQL, C++, C#, React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, Node.js, Express.js, Spring Boot, Flask, REST API, Kafka, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Git, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, Jenkins, AWS EC2, S3, MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Neo4j, JUnit, Mockito, Jest, TDD, XP, Agile
education: Master of Science in Software Engineering, Drexel University, Philadelphia, PA (GPA: 3.72); Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology, Sona College of Technology, Salem, India (GPA: 3.8)
fun: I love baking, especially cakes and cupcakes. Experimenting with new flavors and decorating treats is one of my favorite hobbies.

highlights: Automated cloud infrastructure provisioning with Terraform
Implemented monitoring and logging with Grafana
Built multi-page Streamlit dashboards for Amazon analytics
Developed Neo4j referral system with BigQuery and GDS algorithms
Experimented with GraphRAG agent integrating structured and unstructured data with HuggingFace models

experience.role: Full Stack Developer / Web Design Intern
highlights: Engineered client portal for shipment tracking and invoicing with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL
Managed AWS deployments with Docker and CI/CD pipelines
Implemented JWT authentication and IAM control

projects.name: Sonic Touch – AI Powered E-commerce for Visually Impaired Users
projects.technologies: React, Node.js, Tailwind, Rasa, AWS, Docker
highlights: Deployed voice-enabled e-commerce platform, improving accessibility engagement by 85%
Integrated AI-powered assistant with Rasa for conversational interactions
Containerized full-stack application for cloud deployment

projects.name: Dungeon Crawler Game Engine
highlights: Designed Java-based game with GUI, player movement, enemies, and power-ups
Applied TDD and XP practices achieving 95%+ unit test coverage
Automated CI/CD pipelines with GitLab ensuring reliable deployments

projects.name: Face Mask Detection and Verification System
highlights: Prepared and preprocessed dataset for high-quality training
Trained ResNet50 for mask detection and performed face verification using cosine similarity

projects.name: Ethereum Token Development
highlights: Created custom ERC-20 token reducing gas fees by 40%
Integrated MetaMask for seamless user transactions with 99% success rate
